languages.text: "Спрашивай карты, Домин'{name}. А я буду слушать". {n}Кибелла бережно вынимает колоду имперских Таро. Черный клинок мелькает перед глазами, и темная кровь, струящаяся с ладони культистки, окропляет карты. Кибелла закрывает глаза... и прислушивается.{/n}

"Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Спрашивай карты, Домин'{name}. А я буду слушать". {n}Кибелла бережно вынимает колоду имперских Таро. Черный клинок мелькает перед глазами, и темная кровь, струящаяся с ладони культистки, окропляет карты. Кибелла закрывает глаза... и прислушивается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

"Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

"Ask the cards, Enim'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her wrist onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

"Ask the cards, Enim'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her wrist onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

"Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

"Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

languages.text: «Pregunte a las cartas, Domin'{name}. Y yo escucharé». {n}Kibellah saca con mucho cuidado su baraja del tarot imperial. Una hoja de color negro centellea ante tus ojos, y un hilillo de sangre mana de la palma de su mano hasta caer sobre las cartas. La asesina cierra los ojos... y escucha.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pregunte a las cartas, Domin'{name}. Y yo escucharé». {n}Kibellah saca con mucho cuidado su baraja del tarot imperial. Una hoja de color negro centellea ante tus ojos, y un hilillo de sangre mana de la palma de su mano hasta caer sobre las cartas. La asesina cierra los ojos... y escucha.{/n}

languages.text: 「カードに聞いてみて、ドミン・{name}。私は耳を貸すわ」{n}キベラは注意深く帝国式タロットのデッキを取り出す。目の前で黒い刃がきらめき、彼女の手のひらからカードへと血がしたたり落ちる。彼女は眼を閉じ…耳を傾ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「カードに聞いてみて、ドミン・{name}。私は耳を貸すわ」{n}キベラは注意深く帝国式タロットのデッキを取り出す。目の前で黒い刃がきらめき、彼女の手のひらからカードへと血がしたたり落ちる。彼女は眼を閉じ…耳を傾ける。{/n}

languages.text: “对圣牌开口吧，秘者{name}，我会仔细倾听。”{n}绮贝菈小心翼翼地取出帝国塔罗牌。随后，黑色的刀光在你眼前闪过，鲜血从她的手掌滴到牌上。她闭上双眼……认真倾听。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “对圣牌开口吧，秘者{name}，我会仔细倾听。”{n}绮贝菈小心翼翼地取出帝国塔罗牌。随后，黑色的刀光在你眼前闪过，鲜血从她的手掌滴到牌上。她闭上双眼……认真倾听。{/n}

languages.text: "Befragt die Karten, Domin'{name}. Und ich werde zuhören." {n}Kibellah holt vorsichtig ihr imperiales Tarot hervor. Eine schwarze Klinge blitzt vor deinen Augen auf, und Blut tropft von ihre Handfläche auf die Karten. Sie schließt die Augen ... und hört zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Befragt die Karten, Domin'{name}. Und ich werde zuhören." {n}Kibellah holt vorsichtig ihr imperiales Tarot hervor. Eine schwarze Klinge blitzt vor deinen Augen auf, und Blut tropft von ihre Handfläche auf die Karten. Sie schließt die Augen ... und hört zu.{/n}

languages.text: « Interrogez les cartes, Domin'{name}, et j'écouterai leur réponse. » {n}Kibellah sort délicatement son jeu de tarot impérial. L'éclat d'une lame noire brille devant vos yeux, et du sang s'écoule de sa paume jusque sur les cartes. Elle ferme les yeux... et tend l'oreille.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Interrogez les cartes, Domin'{name}, et j'écouterai leur réponse. » {n}Kibellah sort délicatement son jeu de tarot impérial. L'éclat d'une lame noire brille devant vos yeux, et du sang s'écoule de sa paume jusque sur les cartes. Elle ferme les yeux... et tend l'oreille.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Ask the cards, Domin'. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}

languages.text: "Kartlara soracağını sor Domin'{name}. Ben de dinleyeyim." {n}Kibellah, İmparator'un Tarotu'nu dikkatle çıkarıyor. Gözünün önünde kara bir bıçağın parıltısı görünüyor ve Kibellah'nın avcundan kartların üzerine kan damlıyor. Kibellah gözlerini yumup dinliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ask the cards, Domin'{name}. And I will listen." {n}Kibellah carefully takes out her Imperial Tarot deck. A black blade flashes before your eyes, and blood drips from her palm onto the cards. She closes her eyes... and listens.{/n}
